episodes.title: From Cult Survivor to U.S. Army Officer & Author | Daniella Mestyanek Young’s Story
episodes.description:
Daniella Mestyanek Young — cult survivor, U.S. Army veteran, Harvard-trained organizational psychologist, and bestselling author — joins The Jason Cavness Experience to share her incredible journey from escaping the Children of God cult at 15 to breaking barriers in the military and becoming a thought leader on group psychology, leadership, and coercive control.

We cover:

How cult psychology shows up in workplaces, politics, and daily life

Lessons from serving on integrated combat teams in the U.S. Army

Why knitting became a tool for mental health and advocacy

How to protect your time and labor from coercion

Building authentic communities on TikTok and YouTube

📖 Pre-order Daniella’s new book – The Culting of America (Ships Jan 20, 2026) → https://knittingcultlady.com/products/the-culting-of-america

Timestamps:
0:00 – Intro
1:45 – Growing up in the Children of God cult
8:10 – Escaping at 15 and the culture shock that followed
15:22 – Joining the U.S. Army and serving in combat teams
25:45 – Connecting cult psychology to corporate culture
35:30 – The role of knitting in healing and storytelling
45:12 – Social media, education, and building community
58:05 – Advice for avoiding coercion and valuing your time
1:05:40 – Pre-order The Culting of America

Why Watch:
If you’ve ever wondered how high-control groups operate — and how those same tactics can appear in corporations, politics, and everyday life — Daniella’s story offers eye-opening insights and practical strategies for reclaiming your power.

episodes.title: Daniella Young Scholar of cults, extreme groups and bad leadership.
episodes.description:
Daniella Mestyanek Young is a cult survivor, U.S. Army veteran, Harvard-trained organizational psychologist, and the author of two books about high-control groups. Uncultured, her critically-acclaimed memoir, and The Culting of America, coming January 20 th , 2026, and available for presale at Knitting Cult Lady.

Born into the Children of God—the infamous sex cult known for weaponizing religion, sexuality, and isolation—Daniella escaped at fifteen, only to join another high-control institution: the United States Army.
